example.text: #Title42 officially ends today, and we are completely unprepared for the influx of migrants that will cross our border when it does. There have already been 5 million illegal crossing under the Biden Administration. It’s time to secure the border. [[url]]

That is why I am calling on every single one of my colleagues - on both sides of the aisle - to support this urgent and crucial bipartisan legislation. I am proud to support the Vietnam Human Rights Act, which will ensure the United States is actively promoting freedom for the Vietnamese people and accountability for the communist government that continues to oppress them.
“...Julie Su will surely double down on destructive policies that would bring California’s nightmare to the entire country.” [[url]]

The latest inflation report dropped today, and the numbers are unacceptable. With the average California family spending an extra $967/month due to inflation, It’s no wonder 6 in 10 Americans are living paycheck to paycheck. We must return to fiscal sanity. [[url]]

Today, members of the Congressional Vietnam Caucus are introducing the Vietnam Human Rights Act, to condemn the ongoing human rights abuses by the Vietnamese Communist Party and call on the President to address the situation.
